columns_description.type: type of the found entity, e.g. _person_, _address_ or _tag_, (primary key)
columns_description.text: disambiguated and standardized form of the entity, (primary key)
columns_description.score: relevance score of the entity, e.g. _0.8_
columns_description.entityUid: unique ID of the entity, may be empty
columns_description.sentimentValue: detected sentiment of the entity, from an interval _\[-1.0; 1.0\]_
columns_description.sentimentPolarity: detected sentiment of the entity (_-1_, _0_ or _1_)
columns_description.sentimentLabel: sentiment of the entity as a label (_negative_, _neutral_ or _positive_)
